module.name: navController
module.description: This module is responsible for interfacing with the robot's base to implement the navigation part.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This moudule aims to keep the distance from a specified skeleton fixed. To this end, the robot will be navigating along an imaginary straight track.

param.desc: The magnitude of the velocity used in the bang-bang control (m/s).
The target distance from the skeleton that the controller will attempt to keep (m).
The low threshold of the hsyteresis on the distance error (m).
The high threshold of the hsyteresis on the distance error (m).

output.description: Outputs the navigation state in terms of location and velocity of the base according to the format: x y theta v_x v_theta.
